entry.title: Oregon Health Authority launches interactive transportation injury dashboard
entry.summary: Oregon Health Authority announced a new interactive data dashboard to help track state, county and demographic trends in deaths and hospital visits related to a range of transportation-related injuries.

entry.title: END OF FIRE SEASON FOR ROGUE RIVER-SISKIYOU NATIONAL FOREST
entry.summary: October 17, 2023 7:00 a.m. The Rogue-River Siskiyou National Forest has removed the fire danger rating on all five Ranger Districts across the forest, signaling the end of fire season, as of Tuesday. entry.title: BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON
entry.summary: October 17, 2023 6:00 a.m. A Beach Hazards Statement remains in effect through Wednesday afternoon for the south-central Oregon coast, including parts of Douglas, Coos and Curry counties. entry.title: Umpqua Valley Arts partners with Thrive Umpqua, Umpqua Public Transit District to showcase student art on bus stops

entry.title: Green Valley Pumpkin Patch: launching gourds and sipping cider
entry.summary: OAKLAND — Nothing says fall like picking a plump orange pumpkin, bouncing on hayrides and sipping fresh apple cider — all of which can be found at the Green Valley Pumpkin Patch.

entry.title: Walk, Bike & Roll event encourages healthy approaches to school transportation
entry.summary: GREEN — Nearly 300 children gathered at the shopping center in Green on Friday morning to take part in a Walk, Bike and Roll event to encourage safe, healthy activity for students.
